attributes.additional_details:
Stonehenge is an icon of British Engineering, which, possibly took over 500 years to build.
I hereby petition to create a new 500 year project for the British public.
I personally, have my own ideas for such a project, but I believe that it should be a project for the people of Great Britain, who may choose to extend this project globally.
Therefore the purpose of this petition is to create a cross party endorsed team to initiate a Not for Profit - 500 year project.
